text: Station to Station is the 2015 film of Doug Aitken's 2013 "Nomadic Happening", the film is made up of 62 one-minute films. It was distributed internationally in 2015 following its release at the Sundance Film Festival. ==References== ==External links== * Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:2015 drama films Category:American drama films
title: Station to Station (film)
